title: Train fault causing slower speeds on NSL

title_translations.zh-Hans: 列车故障导致南北线速度减慢
title_translations.ms: Kerosakan kereta api menyebabkan kelajuan perlahan di NSL
title_translations.ta: ரயில் பழுது NSL இல் மெதுவான வேகத்தை ஏற்படுத்துகிறது

updates.text: [NSL]CLEARED:Train service from #MarinaBay to #AngMoKio is now operating normally.
[NSL] Due to earlier train fault at Newton, train will be travelling at slower speed from #MarinaBay to #AngMoKio towards #JurongEast.
